description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts that relate to the taxonomy language found in either the HITRUST Threat Catalogue or the ENISA Threat Taxonomy.
name: OSRS Operational Framewrok - Failure Threat
source: HITRUST Threat Catalogue and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Prolonged period of abnormally low rainfall, and a shortage of water causing damage to assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFC1 Drought

values.description: Large scale and large effects natural disasters. May include natural earthquakes, floods, landslides, heavy rains, and heavy winds.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Disaster
